name: Gifts to help you stay active
tagline: A collection of gifts that will help you and your loved ones stay active, stay healthy and stay stylish whilst doing it.

hero_image.name: Stay Active
hero_image.alt_text: A banner in the style of common fitness brands

gifts.name: Oura smart ring
gifts.description: Next fitness tracker tech. Monitor sleep, activity, and all-round health with this great gift

image.alt_text: Image of Oura smart ring. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Foldable Bike Helmet
gifts.description: Helmet when you need it, stash it when you don't. This folding helmet makes safety as portable as your summer commute.

image.alt_text: Image of Foldable Bike Helmet. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Alo Yoga leggings
gifts.description: Grab a pair of the yoga brand of the moment's leggings - look the part - feel the part

image.alt_text: Image of Alo Yoga leggings. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Fittle box
gifts.description: An all-in-one weights bench, housing everything you need for an at-home workout

image.alt_text: Image of Fittle box. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Football mundial astro boots
gifts.description: Look sharp without looking like a fancy dan.

image.alt_text: Image of Football mundial astro boots. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Liforme yoga mat
gifts.description: Made from fully bio-degradable materials and one of the best yoga mats out there.

image.alt_text: Image of Liforme yoga mat. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: NordicTrack adjustable dumbbell
gifts.description: Great for the keen fitness fan who wants to keep things tidy.

image.alt_text: Image of NordicTrack adjustable dumbbell. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Theragun prime. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sweaty Betty Resistance Bands
gifts.description: More stylish than you average resistance bands, these bands are a perfect edition to your home workout or workout bag.

image.alt_text: Image of Sweaty Betty Resistance Bands. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Technogym Bench
gifts.description: All the tools for a complete workout enclosed in a sleek and versatile home gym bench.

image.alt_text: Image of Technogym Bench. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Apple watch series 11
gifts.description: The Apple watch is now being fully positioned as your route to health, which we are fully onboard with. If you want a wearable, this is still the most desirable.

image.alt_text: Image of Apple watch series 11. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Pin pong set
gifts.description: Neon colours perfect for the summer. Could be the perfect couple's gift. The competitive beware.

image.alt_text: Image of Pin pong set. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Zero 2 Cable Pulley
gifts.description: Expensive, yes but an absolute must for the professional-level home gym. It is such a space saver.

image.alt_text: Image of Zero 2 Cable Pulley. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: FPRO football skills mat
gifts.description: Keep them active with the FPRO Ball Mastery Mat. It'll help them sharpen control, dribbling and first touch. Compact, pro‑tested and perfect for drills or casual show‑offs.

image.alt_text: Image of Fpro football skills mat. A great gift to give to the football player in your life.
